医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
440 万美元赠款推动电子病历中健康数据社会决定因素的标准化LOINC 和 Regenstrief Institute 的健康数据标准已获得 Regenstrief 基金会提供的 440 万美元赠款，用于支持扩展一项全球倡议的工作，该倡议将健康的社会决定因素 (SDOH) 信息分类和标准化到电子健康记录 (EHR) 中，这是一个雄心勃勃的项目将社会需求数据整合到临床护理中，以更有效地解决健康不平等问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/2444-million-grant-drives-forward-standardization-of-social-determinants-of-health-data-in-EHRs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/2444-million-grant-drives-forward-standardization-of-social-determinants-of-health-data-in-EHRs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=589caef3-75ca-40f8-85ce-317e477fa78b Mon, 11 Dec 2023 11:12:14 -0500 $4.4 million grant drives forward standardization of social determinants of health data in EHRs
赋权社区：“用心了解糖尿病”倡议授予抗击心血管疾病的赠款美国糖尿病协会和美国心脏协会已向 10 个社区组织提供赠款，帮助 2 型糖尿病患者降低心脏病、心力衰竭和中风等心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Empowering-communities-Know-Diabetes-by-Heart-initiative-awards-grants-to-combat-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Empowering-communities-Know-Diabetes-by-Heart-initiative-awards-grants-to-combat-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc21513c-c6db-4971-813f-d739f69db4e0 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 11:08:28 -0500 Empowering communities: Know Diabetes by Heart initiative awards grants to combat cardiovascular disease
天然化合物激活巨噬细胞对抗耐药结核菌结核病 (TB) 是一种流行的传染病，每年影响数百万人。在 COVID-19 大流行之前，它曾是单一病原体导致死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Natural-compound-activates-macrophages-to-fight-抵抗-tuberculosis-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Natural-compound-activates-macrophages-to-fight-抵抗-tuberculosis-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0f2159d-2707-4367-a031-d5d4f5804e53 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 11:02:47 -0500 Natural compound activates macrophages to fight resistant tuberculosis bacteria
观察：她有一个家和一份高薪工作。然后疾病和债务颠覆了这一切。莎朗·伍德沃德 (Sharon Woodward) 曾经作为医疗技术人员周游全国。她赚了很多钱，并对自己的技能感到自豪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Watch-She-had-a-home-and-a-good-paying-job-Then-illness-and-debt-upend-it-all。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Watch-She-had-a-home-and-a-good-paying-job-Then-illness-and-debt-upend-it-all。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0caff314-1741-4dad-9823-ae6c3380d5bf Mon, 11 Dec 2023 10:48:11 -0500 Watch: She had a home and a good-paying job. Then illness and debt upended it all.
生物学、解剖学和金融学？更多的医学生也想要获得商业学位近三十年前，杰森·冈德森 (Jasen Gundersen) 进入医学院成为一名农村初级保健医生时，从未考虑过从事商业职业。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Biology-anatomy-and-finance-More-med-students-want-business- Degrees-too.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Biology-anatomy-and-finance-More-med-students-want-business- Degrees-too.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acce9010-eb18-4ac3-b235-c8d0c5b0c445 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 10:45:50 -0500 Biology, anatomy, and finance? More med students want business degrees too
智能手机的使用程度会影响青少年的健康吗？在平均每日智能手机使用率较高的年轻人中，与健康状况不佳相关的多种疾病的发生率较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/What-level-of-smartphone-use-affects-adolescent-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/What-level-of-smartphone-use-affects-adolescent-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bd3800c-ab89-45e1-b80c-286e89cef5d6 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 09:42:00 -0500 What level of smartphone use affects adolescent health?
研究表明，互联网使用量的增加与青少年的焦虑程度增加有关2019 年冠状病毒病期间青少年焦虑和网络成瘾的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Increased-internet-use-linked-to-higher-anxiety-in-teens-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Increased-internet-use-linked-to-higher-anxiety-in-teens-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41562218-d3f2-42e5-966a-51dbe6da313a Mon, 11 Dec 2023 08:55:00 -0500 Increased internet use linked to higher anxiety in teens, research shows
肉类和鱼类的消费与非酒精性脂肪肝之间是否存在关联？肉类和鱼类消费与非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Is-there-an-association- Between-meat-and-fish-conspiration-and-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Is-there-an-association- Between-meat-and-fish-conspiration-and-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91e31598-cbe7-44a2-864e-93e3084c6f64 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 08:24:00 -0500 Is there an association between meat and fish consumption and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease?
DeepMirror 为其直观的分子药物设计软件启动早期访问计划创新产品使药物化学家能够访问和集成人工智能，以提高生产力和创造力，加速治疗药物的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/DeepMirror-launches-early-access-programme-for-its-intuitive-molecular-drug-design-software.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/DeepMirror-launches-early-access-programme-for-its-intuitive-molecular-drug-design-software.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cbf6a4b-f8ed-4742-a04e-dd43abfb8062 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 07:23:00 -0500 DeepMirror launches early access programme for its intuitive molecular drug design software
维生素补充对孕前至产后母亲维生素状态纵向模式的影响研究人员对 NiPPeR 随机临床试验 (RCT) 数据进行了二次分析，以评估孕前、孕期和产后母亲的维生素水平，并探讨了孕前和孕期补充维生素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/The-influence-of-vitamin-supplementation-on-longitudinal-patterns-of-maternal-vitamin-status-from-preconception-to-post-delivery。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/The-influence-of-vitamin-supplementation-on-longitudinal-patterns-of-maternal-vitamin-status-from-preconception-to-post-delivery。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db871993-d750-4665-afa7-8e8b9346cfb2 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 06:41:00 -0500 The influence of vitamin supplementation on longitudinal patterns of maternal vitamin status from preconception to post-delivery
